00031 BOOLEAN InitRoomDatabase( )
00032 {
00033       memset( gubWorldRoomInfo, NO_ROOM, sizeof( gubWorldRoomInfo ) );
00034       memset( gubWorldRoomHidden, TRUE, sizeof( gubWorldRoomHidden ) );
00035       return( TRUE );
00036 }

00043 void SetTileRoomNum( INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubRoomNum )
00044 {
00045       // Add to global room list
00046       gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] = ubRoomNum;

00049 void SetTileRangeRoomNum( SGPRect *pSelectRegion, UINT8 ubRoomNum )
00050 {
00051       INT32 cnt1, cnt2;
00052 
00053       for ( cnt1 = pSelectRegion->iTop; cnt1 <= pSelectRegion->iBottom; cnt1++ )
00054       {
00055             for ( cnt2 = pSelectRegion->iLeft; cnt2 <= pSelectRegion->iRight; cnt2++ )
00056             {
00057                   gubWorldRoomInfo[  (INT16)MAPROWCOLTOPOS( cnt1, cnt2 ) ] = ubRoomNum;
00058             }
00059       }
00060 
00061 }

00063 BOOLEAN InARoom( UINT16 sGridNo, UINT8 *pubRoomNo )
00064 {
00065       if ( gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] != NO_ROOM )
00066       {
00067             if ( pubRoomNo )
00068             {
00069                   *pubRoomNo = gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ];
00070             }
00071             return( TRUE );
00072       }
00073 
00074       return( FALSE );
00075 }
00076 
00077 
00078 BOOLEAN InAHiddenRoom( UINT16 sGridNo, UINT8 *pubRoomNo )
00079 {
00080       if ( gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] != NO_ROOM )
00081       {
00082             if ( (gubWorldRoomHidden[ gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] ] ) )
00083             {
00084                   *pubRoomNo = gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ];
00085                   return( TRUE );
00086             }
00087       }
00088 
00089       return( FALSE );
00090 }

00093 // @@ATECLIP TO WORLD!
00094 void SetRecalculateWireFrameFlagRadius(INT16 sX, INT16 sY, INT16 sRadius)
00095 {
00096       INT16 sCountX, sCountY;
00097       UINT32 uiTile;
00098 
00099       for(sCountY=sY-sRadius; sCountY < (sY+sRadius+2); sCountY++)
00100       {
00101             for(sCountX=sX-sRadius; sCountX < (sX+sRadius+2); sCountX++)
00102             {
00103                   uiTile=MAPROWCOLTOPOS(sCountY, sCountX);
00104 
00105                   gpWorldLevelData[uiTile].uiFlags |= MAPELEMENT_RECALCULATE_WIREFRAMES;
00106 
00107             }
00108       }
00109 }

00112 void SetGridNoRevealedFlag( UINT16 sGridNo )
00113 {
00114 //    UINT32 cnt;
00115 //  ITEM_POOL                             *pItemPool;
00116 //    INT16                                     sX, sY;
00117       LEVELNODE                           *pNode = NULL;
00118       STRUCTURE                           *pStructure, *pBase;
00119 
00120       // Set hidden flag, for any roofs
00121       SetRoofIndexFlagsFromTypeRange( sGridNo, FIRSTROOF, FOURTHROOF, LEVELNODE_HIDDEN  );
00122 
00123       // ATE: Do this only if we are in a room...
00124       if ( gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] != NO_ROOM )
00125       {
00126             SetStructAframeFlags(  sGridNo, LEVELNODE_HIDDEN );
00127             // Find gridno one east as well...
00128 
00129             if ( ( sGridNo + WORLD_COLS ) < NOWHERE )
00130             {
00131                   SetStructAframeFlags(  sGridNo + WORLD_COLS, LEVELNODE_HIDDEN );
00132             }
00133 
00134             if ( ( sGridNo + 1 ) < NOWHERE )
00135             {
00136                   SetStructAframeFlags(  sGridNo + 1, LEVELNODE_HIDDEN );
00137             }
00138       }
00139 
00140       // Set gridno as revealed
00141       gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags |= MAPELEMENT_REVEALED;
00142       if( gfCaves )
00143       {
00144             RemoveFogFromGridNo( sGridNo );
00145       }
00146 
00147       // ATE: If there are any structs here, we can render them with the obscured flag!
00148       // Look for anything but walls pn this gridno!
00149       pStructure  =  gpWorldLevelData[ (INT16)sGridNo ].pStructureHead;
00150 
00151       while ( pStructure != NULL )
00152       {
00153             if ( pStructure->sCubeOffset == STRUCTURE_ON_GROUND || ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_SLANTED_ROOF ) )
00154             {
00155                   if ( ( (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OBSTACLE ) && !( pStructure->fFlags & ( STRUCTURE_PERSON | STRUCTURE_CORPSE ) ) ) || ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_SLANTED_ROOF ) )
00156                   {
00157                         pBase = FindBaseStructure( pStructure );
00158                         //Ja25: DEF: 10/12/99         Added because ...
00159                         if( pBase == NULL )
00160                         {
00161                               pStructure = pStructure->pNext;
00162                               Assert( 0 );
00163                               continue;
00164                         }
00165                         
00166                         // Get LEVELNODE for struct and remove!
00167                         pNode = FindLevelNodeBasedOnStructure( pBase->sGridNo, pBase );
00168 
00169                         if( pNode )
00170                               pNode->uiFlags |= LEVELNODE_SHOW_THROUGH;
00171 
00172                         if ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_SLANTED_ROOF )
00173                         {
00174                               AddSlantRoofFOVSlot( pBase->sGridNo );
00175 
00176                               // Set hidden...
00177                               pNode->uiFlags |= LEVELNODE_HIDDEN;
00178 
00179                         }
00180                   }
00181             }
00182 
00183             pStructure = pStructure->pNext;
00184       }
00185 
00186       gubWorldRoomHidden[ gubWorldRoomInfo[ sGridNo ] ] = FALSE;
00187 
00188 }

00190 
00191 void ExamineGridNoForSlantRoofExtraGraphic( UINT16 sCheckGridNo )
00192 {
00193       LEVELNODE                           *pNode = NULL;
00194       STRUCTURE                           *pStructure, *pBase;
00195       UINT8                                     ubLoop;
00196       DB_STRUCTURE_TILE **    ppTile;
00197       INT16                                     sGridNo;
00198       UINT16                                    usIndex;
00199       BOOLEAN                                   fChanged = FALSE;
00200 
00201       // CHECK FOR A SLANTED ROOF HERE....
00202       pStructure = FindStructure( sCheckGridNo, STRUCTURE_SLANTED_ROOF );
00203 
00204       if ( pStructure != NULL )
00205       {
00206             // We have a slanted roof here ... find base and remove...
00207             pBase = FindBaseStructure( pStructure );
00208             
00209             // Get LEVELNODE for struct and remove!
00210             pNode = FindLevelNodeBasedOnStructure( pBase->sGridNo, pBase );
00211 
00212             // Loop through each gridno and see if revealed....
00213             for ( ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < pBase->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubNumberOfTiles; ubLoop++ )
00214             {
00215                   ppTile = pBase->pDBStructureRef->ppTile;
00216                   sGridNo = pBase->sGridNo + ppTile[ ubLoop ]->sPosRelToBase;
00217 
00218                   if (sGridNo < 0 || sGridNo > WORLD_MAX)
00219                   {
00220                         continue;
00221                   }
00222 
00223                   // Given gridno, 
00224                   // IF NOT REVEALED AND HIDDEN....
00225                   if ( !( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REVEALED ) && pNode->uiFlags & LEVELNODE_HIDDEN )
00226                   {
00227                         // Add graphic if one does not already exist....
00228                         if ( !TypeExistsInRoofLayer( sGridNo, SLANTROOFCEILING, &usIndex ) )
00229                         {
00230                               // Add
00231                               AddRoofToHead( sGridNo, SLANTROOFCEILING1 );
00232                               fChanged = TRUE;
00233                         }
00234                   }
00235  
00236                   // Revealed?
00237                   if ( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REVEALED )
00238                   {
00239                         ///Remove any slant roof items if they exist
00240                         if ( TypeExistsInRoofLayer( sGridNo, SLANTROOFCEILING, &usIndex ) )
00241                         {
00242                               RemoveRoof( sGridNo, usIndex );
00243                               fChanged = TRUE;
00244                         }
00245                   }
00246       
00247             }
00248       }
00249 
00250       if ( fChanged )
00251       {
00252             // DIRTY THE WORLD!
00253             InvalidateWorldRedundency();
00254             SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00255       }
00256 
00257 }

00259 
00260 void RemoveRoomRoof( UINT16 sGridNo, UINT8 bRoomNum, SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier )
00261 {
00262       UINT32 cnt;
00263   ITEM_POOL                         *pItemPool;
00264       INT16                                     sX, sY;
00265       LEVELNODE                           *pNode = NULL;
00266       BOOLEAN                                   fSaidItemSeenQuote = FALSE;
00267 
00268 //    STRUCTURE                           *pStructure;//, *pBase;
00269 
00270       // LOOP THORUGH WORLD AND CHECK ROOM INFO
00271       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
00272       {
00273             if ( gubWorldRoomInfo[ cnt ] == bRoomNum )
00274             {
00275 
00276                   SetGridNoRevealedFlag( (UINT16)cnt );
00277 
00278                   RemoveRoofIndexFlagsFromTypeRange( cnt, FIRSTROOF, SECONDSLANTROOF, LEVELNODE_REVEAL  );
00279 
00280                   // Reveal any items if here!
00281                   if ( GetItemPool( (INT16)cnt, &pItemPool, 0 ) )
00282                   {
00283                         // Set visible! ( only if invisible... )
00284                         if ( SetItemPoolVisibilityOn( pItemPool, INVISIBLE, TRUE ) )
00285                         {
00286                               if ( !fSaidItemSeenQuote )
00287                               {
00288                                     fSaidItemSeenQuote = TRUE;
00289 
00290                                     if ( pSoldier != NULL )
00291                                     {
00292                                           TacticalCharacterDialogue( pSoldier, (UINT16)( QUOTE_SPOTTED_SOMETHING_ONE + Random( 2 ) ) );
00293                                     }
00294                               }
00295                         }
00296                   }
00297 
00298                   // OK, re-set writeframes ( in a radius )
00299                   // Get XY
00300                   ConvertGridNoToXY( (INT16)cnt, &sX, &sY );
00301                   SetRecalculateWireFrameFlagRadius( sX, sY, 2 );
00302 
00303             }
00304       }
00305 
00306       //for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
00307       //{
00308       //    if ( gubWorldRoomInfo[ cnt ] == bRoomNum )
00309       //    {
00310       //          ExamineGridNoForSlantRoofExtraGraphic( (UINT16)cnt );
00311       //    }
00312       //}
00313 
00314       // DIRTY THE WORLD!
00315       InvalidateWorldRedundency();
00316       SetRenderFlags(RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00317 
00318 
00319       CalculateWorldWireFrameTiles( FALSE );
00320 
00321 }

00325 BOOLEAN AddSpecialTileRange( SGPRect *pSelectRegion  )
00326 {
00327       INT32 cnt1, cnt2;
00328 
00329       for ( cnt1 = pSelectRegion->iTop; cnt1 <= pSelectRegion->iBottom; cnt1++ )
00330       {
00331             for ( cnt2 = pSelectRegion->iLeft; cnt2 <= pSelectRegion->iRight; cnt2++ )
00332             {
00333                   AddObjectToHead( (INT16)MAPROWCOLTOPOS( cnt1, cnt2 ), SPECIALTILE_MAPEXIT ); 
00334             }
00335       }
00336 
00337       return( TRUE );
00338 }

00340                   
00341 BOOLEAN RemoveSpecialTileRange( SGPRect *pSelectRegion  )
00342 {
00343       INT32 cnt1, cnt2;
00344 
00345       for ( cnt1 = pSelectRegion->iTop; cnt1 <= pSelectRegion->iBottom; cnt1++ )
00346       {
00347             for ( cnt2 = pSelectRegion->iLeft; cnt2 <= pSelectRegion->iRight; cnt2++ )
00348             {
00349                   RemoveObject( (INT16)MAPROWCOLTOPOS( cnt1, cnt2 ), SPECIALTILE_MAPEXIT ); 
00350             }
00351       }
00352 
00353       return( TRUE );
00354 }
